body: If you haven't heard of it or watched it I have a link for how it goes https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_YjGkihzmRCh3OscZm_8coN1jkoC01oN  The game is basically set up as two team create tnt cannons, etc. to blow up the wall and the other side team. Which ever team survive the longest wins! Simple concept but... the server may explode on itself... yolo right? Well I think this will be an epic addition to any server so Avicus should be one of them.
